item.title: Velvet Revolver - Slither
item.description:
When you look you see
right through me
Cut the rope
I fell to my knees
Born and broken
every single time
Always keep me
under finger
That’s the spot
where you run to me
Might see some type of
pleasure in my mind
Yeah
here comes the water
It’s come to wash away
the sins of
You and I
this time you see

When you seek me
you’ll destroy me
Rape my mind
and smell the poppies
Born and bloodied
every single time
Always keep me
under finger
That’s the spot
where you might linger
Might see some type of
pleasure in my mind
Yeah
here comes the water
It’s come to wash away
the sins of you and I
This time you see
like holy water
It only burns
you faster than
You’ll ever dry
this time with me

see right through me
